# alicloud\_caller\_identity

This data source provides the identity of the current user.

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.65.0+.

## Example Usage

```typescript
import * as constructs from "constructs";
import * as cdktf from "cdktf";
/*Provider bindings are generated by running cdktf get.
See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.*/
import * as alicloud from "./.gen/providers/alicloud";
class MyConvertedCode extends cdktf.TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: constructs.Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    const dataAlicloudCallerIdentityCurrent =
      new alicloud.dataAlicloudCallerIdentity.DataAlicloudCallerIdentity(
        this,
        "current",
        {}
      );
    new cdktf.TerraformOutput(this, "current_user_arn", {
      value: dataAlicloudCallerIdentityCurrent.id,
    });
  }
}

```

## Attributes Reference

The following attributes are exported:

* `id` - Principal ID.
* `arn` - The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of the user making the call.
* `accountId` - Account ID.
* `identityType` - The type of the princiapal. RAMUser for users.
